item.description:
Who Beats Who? is a game I designed. Some of you have played it!

I'm publishing it very soon, if everything works out, and I wanted to give people an opportunity to play it in advance, and to spread the word to lovers of fun games close to home.

Who Beats Who? is a simple game that answers deep questions, like who would win if Voldemort and Gandalf got in a fight.

It runs off a judge mechanic similar to Apples to Apples, except everyone is trying to play a fighter card that will win a big battle royal. Additionally, cards are played face up to inspire debate, and you can bet on other players' fighters, so conversation is always lively -- and sometimes tactical, too!

Additionally, there's another card type (battle cards) that can tip the scales in your favor, and create crazy madcap situations. What if Voldemort is vomiting uncontrollably? Or Gandalf has a bazooka? What if the fight becomes a spelling bee???

Who beats who?

Come to my house and find out! I've got a big table, and pizza will be provided.

 

Oh, and we're on facebook!
